tree_build.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           TREE_BUILD
00004 !
00005 !   Construct tree using particle keys
00006 !   
00007 !   $Revision$
00008 ! ===========================================
00009 
00010 subroutine tree_build
00011 
00012   use treevars
00013   implicit none
00014   include 'mpif.h'
00015 
00016   integer*8, dimension(maxaddress) :: subcell, par_key, res_key        ! All key arrays 64-bit
00017   integer*8, dimension(nppm+2) :: local_key
00018 
00019  ! integer*8, dimension(2*nppm) :: leaf_key, twig_key
00020   integer*8, dimension(8) :: sub_key   ! Child partial key
00021 
00022   integer, dimension(maxaddress) :: ix, iy, res_addr, res_node, res_child, res_owner, &
00023         newentry, treelevel
00024   integer, dimension(nppm+2)  :: local_plist, local_ind, local_owner
00025   integer, dimension(0:maxaddress) ::  cell_addr
00026   logical, dimension(nppm+2) :: part_done            ! finished flag for leaf nodes
00027 
00028   integer*8 ::  parent_key,  key_lo, cell1, cell2
00029 
00030   integer :: i, j, k, nres, ncoll, link, link_addr, & 
00031        level, ilev, ibit, newleaf, nbound, nlistnew, ipart, ilist, ipoint, &
00032        childbyte, parent_addr, &
00033        level_top, level_match, level_diff, iend, &
00034        i1, i2, ierr
00035 
00036   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00037 
00038 
00039   character*1 :: collision(0:maxaddress)
00040   real :: s
00041   logical :: resolved
00042 
00043 
00044   if (tree_debug) write(ipefile,'(/a)') 'TREE BUILD'
00045   if (me==0 .and. tree_debug) write(*,'(a)') 'LPEPC | LOCAL BUILD'
00046 
00047   ! zero table: need list of 'live' addresses to speed up
00048   htable%node = 0
00049   htable%leaves = 0
00050   htable%childcode = 0
00051   htable%link = -1
00052   htable%key = 0_8
00053 
00054   do i=1,npp+2
00055      local_plist(i) = pelabel(i)       ! Particle (global) label for tracking purposes 
00056      local_key(i) = pekey(i)           ! Particle key
00057      local_owner(i) = pepid(i)
00058   end do
00059   i=0                     ! List of free (unused #table-addresses)
00060 
00061 
00062   collision = " "                               ! Collision flag
00063 
00064   !  Check whether boundary particles are close enough to warrant inclusion
00065   !  in tree construction.
00066 
00067   nlist = npp
00068 !  level_top = log(1.*npp) / log(8.)   ! Min level for 'same cell' test 
00069  level_top = 1
00070 ! RH neighbour PE
00071 
00072   if ( me /= num_pe-1 ) then
00073 ! First find level shared by last particle pair in list
00074      key_lo = ieor( pekey(npp), pekey(npp-1) )   ! Picks out 1st position where keys differ
00075      level_diff =  log(1.*key_lo)/log(8.) 
00076      level_match = max( nlev - level_diff, level_top )    ! Excludes low-level end-cells for discontinuous domains
00077      ibit = nlev-level_match               ! bit shift factor 
00078 
00079      cell1 = ishft( pekey(npp), -3*ibit )    ! Subcell number of RH boundary particle
00080      cell2 = ishft( pekey(npp+1), -3*ibit )    ! Subcell number of LH boundary particle of neighbouring PE
00081      if (cell1 == cell2) then
00082         nlist = nlist+1                    ! If keys match at this level then include boundary particle in local tree
00083         local_plist(nlist) = pelabel(npp+1)
00084         local_key(nlist) = pekey(npp+1)
00085         local_owner(nlist) = me+1
00086         if (build_debug) write (ipefile,'(a,i5,a)') 'boundary particle from PE',me+1,' included in list'
00087      endif
00088 
00089   endif
00090 
00091  ! 2nd set: LH neighbour PE
00092 
00093   if ( me /= 0 ) then
00094      iend = npp+2
00095      if ( me == num_pe-1 ) iend = npp+1         ! End node only has one boundary particle
00096 ! First find level shared by first particle pair in list
00097      key_lo = ieor( pekey(1), pekey(2)  )   ! Picks out lower order bits where keys differ
00098      level_diff =  log(1.0*key_lo)/log(8.) 
00099 
00100      level_match = max( nlev - level_diff, level_top )    ! Excludes low-level end-cells for discontinuous domains
00101      ibit = nlev-level_match               ! bit shift factor 
00102 
00103      cell1 = ishft( pekey(1), -3*ibit )    ! Subcell number of LH boundary particle
00104      cell2 = ishft( pekey(iend), -3*ibit )    ! Subcell number of RH boundary particle of neighbouring PE
00105      if (cell1 == cell2) then
00106         nlist = nlist+1         ! If keys match at this level then include boundary particle in local tree
00107         local_plist(nlist) = pelabel(iend)
00108         local_key(nlist) = pekey(iend) 
00109         local_owner(nlist) = me-1
00110         if (build_debug) write (ipefile,'(a,i5,a)') 'boundary particle from PE',me-1,' included in list'
00111 
00112      endif
00113   endif
00114 
00115 
00116 
00117   level = 0                        ! start at root
00118 
00119 
00120   local_ind(1:nlist) = (/(k,k=1,nlist)/) ! Sorted local particle index / leaf number: points to particle properties
00121 
00122   part_done(1:nlist) = .false.              ! flag all particles not finished
00123 
00124 
00125   !  set up root node
00126 
00127   htable(1)%node = -1                   !  node #
00128   htable(1)%owner = me                   ! Owner
00129   htable(1)%key = 1_8                    !  key
00130   htable(1)%link = -1                   !  collision link
00131   htable(1)%leaves = npp              ! root contains all leaves, excluding boundary particles
00132   ntwig = 1
00133   nleaf = 0
00134   tablehigh = 0
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138   do while ( nlist > 0 )              ! While any particle not finished:
00139 
00140      level = level + 1                 ! Next sublevel
00141      if (level>nlev) then
00142        write(*,*) 'Problem with tree on PE ',me,' - no more levels '
00143        write(*,'(a/(z20))') 'Remaining keys: ',local_key(1:nlist)
00144 !       call closefiles
00145        call MPI_ABORT(MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00146        stop
00147      endif
00148      ibit = nlev - level               ! bit shift factor (0=highest leaf node, nlev-1 = root)
00149      newleaf=0                         ! # new leaves at this level
00150      nbound=0                            ! # boundary particles located (max 2)
00151      ! Determine subcell # from key
00152      ! At a given level, these will be unique
00153      
00154      do i=1,nlist
00155         subcell(i) = ishft( local_key(i), -3_8*ibit )    
00156 
00157         ! cell address hash function
00158         cell_addr(i) = IAND( subcell(i), hashconst)
00159      end do
00160 
00161      if (build_debug) then
00162         write (ipefile,'(/a//a,i5,a5,i5,a5,z20/)') '---------------','Starting level ',level, &
00163              ' ibit',ibit,' iplace',iplace
00164         write (ipefile,*) 'i,   p,     key,           owner     cell_key,    cell_addr'
00165         write (ipefile,'(2i4,z20,i3,o20,i6)') &
00166              (i,local_plist(i),local_key(i),local_owner(i),subcell(i),cell_addr(i),i=1,nlist) 
00167      endif
00168 
00169      nres =0          ! # resolved entries
00170      ncoll = 0
00171 
00172 
00173      !  Make set of entries at current level and tag collisions
00174 
00175      do i = 1,nlist
00176         tablehigh = max(tablehigh,cell_addr(i))                 ! Track highest address
00177         if ( htable( cell_addr(i) )%node == 0 .and. htable(cell_addr(i))%key /= -1 ) then       ! Is entry empty?
00178            nres = nres + 1
00179            newentry(nres) = cell_addr(i)                  ! Yes, so create new entry:
00180            htable(cell_addr(i))%node = i                  !   local pointer
00181            htable(cell_addr(i))%key = subcell(i)            !   key
00182            htable(cell_addr(i))%leaves = 1                !   # children
00183            htable(cell_addr(i))%owner = local_owner(i)       ! Set owner of node equal to owner of particle
00184 
00185         else if ( htable( cell_addr(i) )%node /= 0 .AND. &   ! Entry exists and keys match
00186              htable(cell_addr(i))%key == subcell(i) ) then       ! => twig cell  
00187 
00188            htable(cell_addr(i))%node = i               ! Overwrite previous (leaf) entry
00189            htable(cell_addr(i))%leaves =  htable(cell_addr(i))%leaves + 1
00190            htable(cell_addr(i))%owner = me       ! Set owner of node equal to local PE
00191 
00192         else                                    ! Entry exists and keys don't match
00193            ncoll = ncoll + 1                    ! Increment collision count
00194            res_addr(ncoll) = cell_addr(i)        ! Reduced list of addresses 
00195            res_key(ncoll) = subcell(i)           !     ..    .. of keys
00196            res_node(ncoll) = i                   !     ..    .. of pointers
00197            res_child(ncoll) =1
00198            res_owner(ncoll) =local_owner(i)
00199         end if
00200      end do
00201 
00202 
00203 
00204      ! Make reduced list of empty addresses to speed up collision resolution
00205      i2 = maxaddress  ! count back from end of table
00206      do i=1,ncoll
00207         i1 = i2
00208         do while (htable(i1)%node /= 0 .or. htable(i1)%key==-1 ) 
00209            i1=i1-1  ! skip existing or dummy entries
00210         end do
00211         free_addr(i) = all_addr(i1)
00212         i2 = i1-1
00213      end do
00214 
00215 
00216      if (build_debug) &
00217           write(ipefile,*) '# collisions ',ncoll,' free addresses: ',(free_addr(i),i=1,ncoll)
00218 
00219 
00220      do i = 1,ncoll
00221 
00222         if ( htable( res_addr(i) )%link == -1) then     ! Entry occupied without link
00223 
00224            nres = nres + 1                             ! create entry at empty address
00225            newentry(nres) = free_addr(i)                 
00226 
00227            htable( free_addr(i) )%node = res_node(i)                     
00228            htable( free_addr(i) )%key = res_key(i)
00229            htable( free_addr(i) )%leaves = res_child(i)
00230            htable( free_addr(i) )%owner = res_owner(i)
00231            htable( free_addr(i) )%link = -1
00232            htable( res_addr(i) )%link = free_addr(i)     ! Create link from 1st duplicate entry to new entry
00233 
00234            ! need to check here for colliding twig nodes
00235 
00236         else if ( htable( res_addr(i) )%link /= -1 ) then     ! Occupied with link already
00237 
00238            link_addr = res_addr(i)                          ! Start of chain
00239            resolved = .false.                                     ! Resolve flag
00240 
00241            do while (  .not. resolved )       ! Find end of chain  
00242               link_addr = htable(link_addr)%link
00243 
00244               if ( htable( link_addr )%key == res_key(i) ) then
00245                  ! Occupied with same key -> twig node
00246                  htable( link_addr )%leaves =  htable( link_addr )%leaves + 1
00247                  resolved = .true.
00248 
00249               else if ( htable (link_addr)%link == -1 ) then
00250 
00251                  nres = nres + 1                             ! create entry at empty address
00252                  newentry(nres) = free_addr(i)
00253                  htable( free_addr(i) )%node = res_node(i)                     
00254                  htable( free_addr(i) )%key = res_key(i)
00255                  htable( free_addr(i) )%leaves = res_child(i)
00256                  htable( free_addr(i) )%owner = res_owner(i)
00257                  htable( free_addr(i) )%link = -1                
00258 
00259                  htable( link_addr )%link = free_addr(i)      ! Create link from last duplicate entry to displaced entry
00260                  resolved = .true.
00261               else
00262                  ! not yet resolved
00263               endif
00264            end do
00265 
00266 
00267         else
00268            write (ipefile,*) 'Key number ',i,' not resolved'
00269         end if
00270         tablehigh = max(tablehigh,free_addr(i))                 ! Track highest address
00271 
00272      end do
00273 
00274 
00275 
00276      ! Go through new entries and sort them into twigs/leaves
00277 
00278      do i = 1,nres
00279 
00280         if ( htable( newentry(i) )%leaves == 1 .and. htable(newentry(i))%owner == me) then
00281            ! create new leaf
00282            newleaf = newleaf + 1 
00283            nleaf = nleaf + 1 
00284            ipoint =  htable( newentry(i) )%node                  ! local pointer
00285            ipart = pelabel( local_ind( ipoint ) )                ! particle label
00286            htable( newentry(i) )%leaves = 1                      ! contained leaves
00287            htable( newentry(i) )%childcode = ipart               ! store label in #-table
00288            htable( newentry(i) )%node = local_ind(ipoint)        ! store index in #-table
00289            htable( newentry(i) )%owner = me                      ! Set owner
00290            local_plist( ipoint ) = 0                             ! label as done
00291            leaf_key(nleaf) = htable(newentry(i))%key             ! Add to key list
00292  
00293         else if ( htable( newentry(i) )%leaves == 1 .and. htable(newentry(i))%owner /= me) then
00294 
00295            ! unwanted leaf generated by boundary particle, so remove entry
00296            ! -> this prevents duplicate branch nodes being generated in make_branches
00297 
00298            nbound = nbound + 1
00299             ipoint =  htable( newentry(i) )%node         ! local pointer
00300             local_plist( ipoint ) = 0                    ! label as done - removes particle from list
00301             htable( newentry(i) )%node = 0               ! remove node from #table
00302             htable( newentry(i) )%key = -1_8               ! but retain %link to dummy entry 
00303                                                          ! in case it's in the middle of a chain
00304             htable( newentry(i) )%leaves = 0
00305             htable( newentry(i) )%childcode = 0 
00306 
00307         else if ( htable( newentry(i) )%leaves > 1 ) then
00308            ! twig
00309            twig_key(ntwig) = htable(newentry(i))%key             ! Add to key list
00310            ntwig = ntwig + 1
00311            htable( newentry(i) )%node = -ntwig
00312            htable( newentry(i) )%owner = me                       ! Set owner
00313            htable( newentry(i) )%childcode = 0  ! Zero children byte-code in twig nodes
00314 
00315         else
00316            ! empty - problem with flagging
00317         endif
00318 
00319      end do
00320 
00321 
00322      ! output interim hash table
00323      if (build_debug) then
00324         write (ipefile,'(/a,i6/8x,a/8x,a)') 'Hash table at level',level, &
00325              'entry,    node,    key,     link  children  collision', &
00326              '----------------------------------------------------- '
00327 
00328         ! flag old & new collisions
00329 
00330         do i=0,tablehigh
00331            if ( collision(i) == "X") collision(i) = "c" 
00332            if (htable(i)%node/=0 .and. htable(i)%link/= -1 .and. collision(i)/="c") collision(i)="X"
00333            if (htable(i)%node /=0 ) write (ipefile,'(2i10,o10,2i10,4x,a1)') &
00334                 i,htable(i)%node,htable(i)%key,htable(i)%link,htable(i)%leaves,collision(i)
00335         end do
00336      endif
00337 
00338 
00339 
00340      ! Make new lists from unfinished particles.
00341      nlistnew = nlist - newleaf - nbound
00342      part_done(1:nlist) = (local_plist(1:nlist)==0)
00343       k=0
00344      do i=1,nlist
00345         if (.not. part_done(i)) then
00346           k=k+1
00347           local_key(k) = local_key(i)
00348           local_ind(k) = local_ind(i)
00349           local_plist(k) = local_plist(i)
00350           local_owner(k) = local_owner(i)                 
00351         endif
00352 
00353      end do
00354 
00355      
00356      nlist = nlistnew
00357 
00358      if (build_debug) then
00359         !  Go through list of unresolved entries
00360         write (ipefile,*) 'So far: ',nleaf,' leaves, ',newleaf, 'new on level,',ntwig,' twigs, ',ncoll,' collisions'
00361         write (ipefile,*) 'Particles left: ',nlist,', new list:',local_plist(1:nlist)
00362      endif
00363 
00364   end do
00365 
00366 
00367   ! Fill in byte code for children in table (twig entries contain # children at this point)
00368 
00369   nnodes = nleaf + ntwig  ! total number of local tree nodes
00370 
00371 
00372   treekey(1:nleaf) = leaf_key(1:nleaf)
00373   twig_key(ntwig) = 1  ! add root for later
00374   treekey(nleaf+1:nnodes) = twig_key(1:ntwig)  ! add twigs to list 
00375 !  write (*,*) 'Keys on :',me,nnodes,(treekey(i),i=1,nnodes)
00376 
00377   do i=1,nnodes-1
00378      childbyte = IAND( treekey(i), hashchild)    ! extract last 3 bits from key
00379      parent_key = ishft( treekey(i),-3 )      ! parent key
00380      parent_addr = key2addr(parent_key,'BUILD: childbyte')
00381      ! Construct children byte-code (8 settable bits indicating which children nodes present)
00382      htable(parent_addr)%childcode = ibset( htable(parent_addr)%childcode, childbyte )
00383 ! This is equivalent to:
00384 !     htable(parent_addr)%childcode =  htable(parent_addr)%childcode + 2**(childbyte)
00385   end do
00386 
00387 
00388  sum_unused = 0
00389  iused = 1   ! reset used-address counter
00390  do i=0, maxaddress
00391     if (htable(i)%node == 0 .and. htable(i)%key /=-1 .and. i> free_lo) then
00392        sum_unused = sum_unused+1
00393        free_addr(sum_unused) = i            ! Free address list for resolving collisions
00394        point_free(i) = sum_unused           ! Index
00395     else
00396        point_free(i) = 0
00397     endif
00398  enddo
00399     
00400 
00401 
00402 end subroutine tree_build
